Title: AN ACT REPEALING TARIFF 7 B, ARTICLE SEVEN, OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE LAWS OF THE PHILIPPINE ARCHIPELAGO, WHEREBY AN INDUSTRIAL TAX IS IMPOSED UPON NOTARIES PUBLIC.
Data:
[ Act No. 647, March 03, 1903 ]
AN ACT REPEALING TARIFF 7 B, ARTICLE SEVEN, OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE LAWS OF THE PHILIPPINE ARCHIPELAGO, WHEREBY AN INDUSTRIAL TAX IS IMPOSED UPON NOTARIES PUBLIC.
By authority of the United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Commission, that:
Section 1.1a—àphi1 Tariff 7 B, article seven, of Internal Revenue Laws of the Philippine Islands, whereby an industrial tax is imposed upon notaries public, is hereby repealed. This Act shall be retroactive and effective from the first day of February, nineteen hundred and three, when the Land Registration Act, providing a new notarial system, went into effect.
Section 2. The public good requiring the speedy enactment of this bill, the passage of the same is hereby expedited in accordance with section two of "An Act prescribing the order of procedure by the Commission in the enactment of laws," passed September twenty-sixth, nineteen hundred.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, March 3, 1903.
